title: Bronco® Brand Sends Three Teams to Rebelle Rally; Looks for Three-Peat with Bronco Sport in X-Cross™ Category
description: Bronco, Ford’s outdoor brand of Built Wild and only-4x4 SUVs, will attempt to make it three victories in a row at the Rebelle Rally’s X-Cross bone stock class when it takes Bronco Sport™ back to the event today. The Bronco Sport will join a Bronco two-door and four-door at the all-woman outdoor navigation competition.
